item.description: Sweet Alert JS á€¡á€¬á€¸ NetSuite User Event Script á€™á€¾á€¬á€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€á€»á€„á€ºá€›á€„á€º á€¡á€±á€¬á€€á€ºá€•á€« Code á€¡á€¬á€¸á€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€…á€™á€ºá€¸á€á€•á€ºá€”á€­á€¯á€„á€ºá€•á€«á€á€Šá€ºá‹ Sweet Alert Script UserEventâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Sweet Alert JS á€¡á€¬á€¸ NetSuite User Event Script á€™á€¾á€¬á€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€á€»á€„á€ºá€›á€„á€º á€¡á€±á€¬á€€á€ºá€•á€« Code á€¡á€¬á€¸á€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€…á€™á€ºá€¸á€á€•á€ºá€”á€­á€¯á€„á€ºá€•á€«á€á€Šá€ºá‹

Sweet Alert Script

swal("Hello Myatkrub!")

UserEvent Script

function beforeLoad(type, form, request) {
    if (type == 'create') {
        var sweet = '';
        sweet += '<html><body><script src="https://unpkg.com/sweetalert/dist/sweetalert.min.js"></script><script type=\'text/javascript\'>swal("Hello Myatkrub!")</script></body></html>';
        var field = form.addField("custpage_alertfield", "inlinehtml");
        field.setDefaultValue(sweet);
    }
}

á€á€á€¼á€¬á€¸ alert, pup up á€™á€»á€¬á€¸á€€á€­á€¯

https://sweetalert.js.org/ á€á€½á€„á€ºá€á€½á€¬á€¸á€›á€±á€¬á€€á€º á€œá€±á€·á€œá€¬á€”á€­á€¯á€„á€ºá€•á€«á€€á€¼á€±á€¬á€„á€ºá€¸â€¦

item.content:encoded:
RFM Analysis á€†á€­á€¯á€á€¬á€˜á€¬á€œá€²

RFM á€†á€­á€¯á€á€¬á€€á€€á€±á€¬? ğŸ‘€

RFM (á€™á€€á€¼á€¬á€™á€®áŠ á€¡á€€á€¼á€­á€™á€ºá€›á€±áŠ á€„á€½á€±á€€á€¼á€±á€¸) á€á€½á€²á€á€¼á€™á€ºá€¸á€…á€­á€á€ºá€–á€¼á€¬á€á€¼á€„á€ºá€¸á€á€Šá€ºá€…á€»á€±á€¸á€€á€½á€€á€ºá€›á€¾á€¬á€–á€½á€±á€›á€±á€¸á€”á€Šá€ºá€¸á€…á€”á€…á€ºá€–á€¼á€…á€ºá€•á€¼á€®á€¸á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€…á€½á€²á€á€°á€™á€»á€¬á€¸á€á€Šá€ºá€™á€Šá€ºá€á€Šá€·á€ºá€œá€á€ºá€á€œá€±á€¬á€á€šá€ºá€šá€°á€á€°á€™á€Šá€ºá€™á€»á€¾á€á€šá€ºá€šá€°á€á€Šá€º (recency)áŠ á€™á€Šá€ºá€™á€»á€¾á€á€šá€ºá€á€Šá€º (á€€á€¼á€­á€™á€ºá€”á€¾á€¯á€”á€ºá€¸) á€”á€¾á€„á€·á€ºá€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€…á€½á€²á€á€°á€™á€Šá€ºá€™á€»á€¾á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€…á€½á€²á€á€Šá€ºá€€á€­á€¯á€†á€”á€ºá€¸á€…á€…á€ºá€á€¼á€„á€ºá€¸á€¡á€¬á€¸á€–á€¼á€„á€·á€ºá€™á€Šá€ºá€á€Šá€·á€ºá€…á€¬á€¸á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€á€°á€™á€»á€¬á€¸á€™á€Šá€ºá€™á€»á€¾á€¡á€€á€±á€¬á€„á€ºá€¸á€†á€¯á€¶á€¸á€–á€¼á€…á€ºá€á€Šá€ºá€€á€­á€¯á€†á€¯á€¶á€¸á€–á€¼á€á€ºá€›á€”á€ºá€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€á€Šá€ºá‹ RFM á€á€½á€²á€á€¼á€™á€ºá€¸á€…á€­á€á€ºá€–á€¼á€¬á€á€¼á€„á€ºá€¸á€á€Šá€ºá€á€„á€ºáá€…á€®á€¸á€•á€½á€¬á€¸á€›á€±á€¸á€œá€¯á€•á€ºá€„á€”á€ºá€¸á áˆá€% á€á€Šá€ºá€á€„á€·á€ºá€–á€±á€¬á€€á€ºá€á€Šá€ºá€™á€»á€¬á€¸á á‚á€% á€™á€¾á€œá€¬á€á€Šá€ºá€Ÿá€°á€á€±á€¬á€…á€»á€±á€¸á€€á€½á€€á€ºá€›á€¾á€¬á€–á€½á€±á€›á€±á€¸á€¡á€•á€±á€«á€ºá€¡á€á€¼á€±á€á€¶á€á€Šá€ºá‹

NetSuite Saved Search á€á€½á€„á€º á€˜á€šá€ºá€œá€­á€¯ á€•á€¼á€¯á€œá€¯á€•á€ºá€™á€¾á€¬á€œá€²?

Reports > Saved Searches > All Saved Searches > New á€€á€­á€¯á€”á€­á€¯á€•á€ºá€•á€«

Search Title = RFM Analysis á€Ÿá€¯á€•á€±á€¸á€•á€«

Criteria : Type = Invoice , Tax Line = false , Main Line = false

In Results:

Tab á€á€½á€„á€º Sort by = Amount



Field : Name , Summary Type = Group By , Label = Customer Name

Field : Formula(Percent) , Summary Type = Sum , PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) , Label = %Recency

Field : Formula(Percent) , Summary Type = Sum , PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) , Label = %Frequency

Field : Formula(Percent) , Summary Type = Sum , PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({amount}) ASC) , Label = %Monetary

Field : Formula(Text) , Summary Type = Maximum , CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.0 and 0.2 THEN 1 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.2 and 0.4 THEN 2 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.4 and 0.6 THEN 3 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.6 and 0.8 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END || CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.0 and 0.2 THEN 1 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.2 and 0.4 THEN 2 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.4 and 0.6 THEN 3 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.6 and 0.8 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END || CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.0 and 0.2 THEN 1 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.2 and 0.4 THEN 2 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.4 and 0.6 THEN 3 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.6 and 0.8 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END , Label = RFM

Field : Formula(Numeric) , Summary Type = Sum , CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.0 and 0.2 THEN 1 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.2 and 0.4 THEN 2 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.4 and 0.6 THEN 3 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) DESC) BETWEEN 0.6 and 0.8 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END , Label = R

Field : Formula(Numeric) , Summary Type = Sum , CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.0 and 0.2 THEN 1 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.2 and 0.4 THEN 2 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.4 and 0.6 THEN 3 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({internalid}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.6 and 0.8 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END , Label = F

Field : Formula(Numeric) , Summary Type = Sum , CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.0 and 0.2 THEN 1 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.2 and 0.4 THEN 2 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.4 and 0.6 THEN 3 WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM({Amount}) ASC) BETWEEN 0.6 and 0.8 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END , Label = M

Field : Formula(Numeric) , Summary Type = Sum , ROUND({today}-MAX({trandate})) , Label = Days from Last Purchased

Field : Document Number , Summary Type = Count , Label = Orders

Field : Amount , Summary Type = Sum , Label = Amount

á€™á€¾á€á€ºá€á€»á€€á€º

á€•á€¯á€¶á€™á€¾á€”á€ºá€¡á€¬á€¸á€–á€¼á€„á€·á€º RFM á€á€”á€ºá€–á€­á€¯á€¸á€€á€­á€¯ 111 á€Ÿá€¯á€á€á€ºá€™á€¾á€á€ºá€‘á€¬á€¸á€›á€¬á€á€½á€„á€º á€’á€®á€–á€±á€¬á€ºá€™á€¼á€°á€œá€¬á€á€½á€„á€º 555 á€Ÿá€¯á€á€á€ºá€™á€¾á€á€ºá€‘á€¬á€¸á€•á€«á€á€Šá€ºá‹

Have Fun! ğŸ¦„

item.content:encoded:
áá‹ WebStorm á€–á€½á€„á€·á€ºá€•á€«á‹

á‚á‹ á€á€„á€ºáá€€á€½á€”á€ºá€•á€»á€°á€á€¬ OS á€…á€”á€…á€ºá€•á€±á€«á€º á€™á€°á€á€Šá€ºá á€¡á€±á€¬á€€á€ºá€•á€«á€á€­á€¯á€·á€™á€¾á€á€…á€ºá€á€¯á€€á€­á€¯á€•á€¼á€¯á€œá€¯á€•á€ºá€•á€«á‹

  • á€¡á€€á€šá€ºá á€á€„á€ºá€á€Šá€º Windows OS á€€á€­á€¯á€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€”á€±á€œá€»á€¾á€„á€º File> Settings á€€á€­á€¯á€›á€½á€±á€¸á€á€»á€šá€ºá€•á€«á‹****
  • Mac OS á€€á€­á€¯á€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€”á€±á€œá€»á€¾á€„á€º WebStorm> Preferences á€€á€­á€¯á€›á€½á€±á€¸á€á€»á€šá€ºá€•á€«á‹

áƒá‹ Plugins> Browse repositories á€€á€­á€¯á€›á€½á€±á€¸á€á€»á€šá€ºá€•á€«á‹

á„á‹ Manage repositories á€€á€­á€¯á€›á€½á€±á€¸á€á€»á€šá€ºá€•á€«á‹

á…á‹ SuiteCloud IDE plug-in update site á€€á€­á€¯ Repository URL á€”á€±á€›á€¬á€á€½á€„á€ºá€‘á€Šá€·á€ºá€á€½á€„á€ºá€¸á€›á€”á€ºáŠ

á€á€„á€ºá€•á€œá€•á€ºá€¡á€„á€ºá€€á€­á€¯á€¡á€á€…á€ºá€•á€¼á€±á€¬á€„á€ºá€¸á€á€Šá€·á€ºá€¡á€á€»á€­á€”á€ºá€á€­á€¯á€„á€ºá€¸á€á€½á€„á€ºá€”á€±á€¬á€€á€ºá€†á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€±á€«á€ºá€¡á€•á€¼á€±á€¬á€„á€ºá€¸á€¡á€œá€²á€™á€»á€¬á€¸á€€á€­á€¯á€¡á€œá€­á€¯á€¡á€œá€»á€±á€¬á€€á€ºá€›á€œá€­á€¯á€œá€»á€¾á€„á€ºá€¡á€á€¯á€¶á€¸á€•á€¼á€¯á€•á€«

https://system.netsuite.com/download/suitecloud-sdk/ideplugin/webstorm/latest/updatePlugins.xml

https://system.netsuite.com/download/suitecloud-sdk/ideplugin/webstorm/19.2/updatePlugins.xml
